title: Juvenile recovering after shot in hand in Mosby Court
content:
RICHMOND, VA (WWBT) -
A juvenile is recovering after getting shot in the hand early Sunday morning.
This happened in the 1300 block of Coalter Street in Richmond's Mosby Court, just after 2:30 a.m.
When officers arrived on the scene, they found the victim with gunshot wounds and he was quickly transported to the hospital.
Richmond police say the victim's injuries are non-life-threatening.
